name: overdry
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make something become too dry, or to become too dry: If you overdry your hair, it will become dull and frizzy. The new mud face mask won't over-dry your skin but rather leave it smooth. Use a low heat to prevent fabric from overdrying.
More examplesFewer examplesTry not to over-dry your hair, and whenever possible, let it dry naturally.Using the reheat button on the toaster tends to over-dry the toast.To avoid overdrying, set the timer and temperature low.
